Source.Name: httping
Source.Summary: Httping is like 'ping' but for http-requests.
Source.Description: Give it an url, and it'll show you how long it takes to connect, send a request and retrieve the reply (only the headers). Be aware that the transmission across the network also takes time! So it measures the latency of the webserver + network.
